title: Hans Kuthy
text:
I am a data science major at Northwestern University, originally from Mauritius. In 2023 I earned a full scholarship from the Mauritian government as the top‑ranked STEM student nationally. My academic interests span large language models, machine learning, and sports analytics. I aim to harness data‑driven insights to solve real‑world problems and to inspire others through teaching and community engagement.
Learn more about me →

title: Hans Kuthy
text:
Hey, I’m Hans

Thanks for stopping by!
I’m a data science major at Northwestern University, originally from Mauritius.
In 2023 I earned a full government scholarship as the top‑ranked STEM student nationally.
My interests span machine learning, large language models (LLMs), and sports analytics.
Get in touch →

title: Hans Kuthy
text:
About me


From Mauritius to Northwestern, with a mission to make data meaningful.
I love applying ML techniques to real‑world data—especially in sports and social good—and I enjoy working in both R and Python. When not coding, you’ll find me exploring new analytics papers or writing blog posts on the latest LLM hacks.


First ranked STEM Scholar · State of Mauritius Scholar · 2023




At Northwestern I’m deepening my skills in predictive modeling and ethical data storytelling. I’m driven by the belief that data is most powerful when shared transparently and applied responsibly.


B.S. in Data Science · Northwestern University · Class of 2028
